isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 MODEL - LIGHT SYSTEMS - OPERATION - Trailer Work or Hook-Up

svcproc.title: Trailer Work or Hook-Up
svcproc.para: Power from the (B1) battery stud is applied to circuits 14K and 14AN, 10A fuse F1-D, circuit 85, and work light switch (25). When the switch is moved to the on position, power is applied to circuit 65, connector (23), a black wire, connector (N/L), and an orange wire to the work light. The work light is grounded through a white wire, connector (N/L), and circuit 11 to the J7 cab ground.
